name: One Step Behind
description: The theft of Boreth's time crystals was just the first step in Mudd's galactic crime spree. Now he's stealing technology from planets across the quadrant. Figure out Mudd's ultimate goal and stop him before he does any more damage!
rules:
— There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
— In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
— Unique Faction Missions and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of Po, Ba'ul, Ishka, Tenavik, or Discovery Crew will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
— Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
— Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Po, Ba'ul, Ishka, Tenavik, or Discovery Crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "We Timekeepers may stay cloistered on Boreth, but stories have reached even us of this... Mudd. This man has no honor, and no capacity to understand the power that the crystals wield. If he does indeed have them, we are under a great threat."

"Agreed. Mudd's already used a small time crystal attempting to capture the Discovery. He must have sought a larger source when that failed. We just can't get rid of this guy. Let's put out an Federation alert for any information about his whereabouts."

"One of your Federation members came to Kaminar and stole from us. A type of shielding for our drones went missing after we registered his presence. You will return to us what is ours and never return."

"Perhaps you'd be so kind as to offer some assistance? We've been swindled by this Mudd in the past, and several Ferengi worry we'll be targets once again. Protecting our profits sometimes means asking help from others. Not one of the Rules of Acquisition, but still it's true."

"We Timekeepers may stay cloistered on Boreth, but stories have reached even us of this... Mudd. This man has no honor, and no capacity to understand the power that the crystals wield. If he does indeed have them, we are under a great threat."

"Agreed. Mudd's already used a small time crystal attempting to capture the Discovery. He must have sought a larger source when that failed. We just can't get rid of this guy. Let's put out an Federation alert for any information about his whereabouts."

"One of your Federation members came to Kaminar and stole from us. A type of shielding for our drones went missing after we registered his presence. You will return to us what is ours and never return."

"Perhaps you'd be so kind as to offer some assistance? We've been swindled by this Mudd in the past, and several Ferengi worry we'll be targets once again. Protecting our profits sometimes means asking help from others. Not one of the Rules of Acquisition, but still it's true."
